sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AjaxRiskUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AjaxRiskUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AjaxRiskUtil = Class.create();
AjaxRiskUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getRiskRankDetails : function() {
		var impact = this.getParameter('sysparm_impact');
		var probability = this.getParameter('sysparm_probability');
		var riskId = this.getParameter('sysparm_risk_id');
		
		var riskRankCalculator = new RiskRankCalculator();
		var riskRank = riskRankCalculator.getRiskRankDetails(riskId,impact,probability);
		var result = this.newItem('result');
		result.setAttribute('rank',riskRank.rank);
		result.setAttribute('color',riskRank.color);
		result.setAttribute('value',riskRank.value);
	},

    type: 'AjaxRiskUtil'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-25 13:55:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>000b86e80fa333007c923fabfa767ede</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AjaxRiskUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_000b86e80fa333007c923fabfa767ede</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-28 13:52:27</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
